abstract: Firemint, the developer of the popular iPhone game Flight Control, is going beyond the iPad’s roomy screen and into the third dimension.
snippet: Firemint, the developer of the popular iPhone game Flight Control, is going beyond the iPad’s roomy screen and into the third dimension.
lead_paragraph: 2:26 p.m. | Updated  To include additional details about the application.

headline.main: Flight Control Comes to the iPad in 3-D
